DocumentEntries.description: Gets or sets list of documents.

Href.description: Gets or sets path to document to append at the server.

ImportFormatMode.description: Gets or sets defines which formatting will be used: appended or destination document.Can be KeepSourceFormatting or UseDestinationStyles.

Links.description: Gets or sets a list of links that originate from this document.

FileName.description: Gets or sets the name of the file.

SourceFormat.description: Gets or sets the original format of the document.

IsEncrypted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether returns true if the document is encrypted and requires a password to open.

IsSigned.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether returns true if the document contains a digital signature. This property merely informs that a
digital signature is present on a document, but it does not specify whether the signature is valid or not.

DocumentProperties.description: Gets or sets returns document properties.

Href.description: Gets or sets path to document to append at the server.

Rel.description:
Gets or sets atom:link elements MAY have a "rel" attribute that indicates the link
relation type.  If the "rel" attribute is not present, the link
element MUST be interpreted as if the link relation type is "alternate".

Type.description:
Gets or sets on the link element, the "type" attribute's value is an advisory
media type: it is a hint about the type of the representation that is
expected to be returned when the value of the href attribute is
dereferenced.  Note that the type attribute does not override the
actual media type returned with the representation.

Title.description:
Gets or sets the "title" attribute conveys human-readable information about the
link.  The content of the "title" attribute is Language-Sensitive.

link.description: Gets or sets link to the document.

Code.description: Gets or sets api error code.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the bookmark.

Text.description: Gets or sets the text enclosed in the bookmark.

Web.description: Gets or sets hTML string color representation.

Alpha.description: Gets or sets alpha component of color structure.

ClassName.description: Gets or sets the name of the class.

ClassProbability.description: Gets or sets the probability of class.

Node.description: Gets or sets link to  node.

Offset.description: Gets or sets offset into the node.

ComparingWithDocument.description: Gets or sets path to document to compare at the server.

Author.description: Gets or sets initials of the author to use for revisions.

CompositingMode.description: Gets or sets a value that specifies how composited images are drawn to this Graphics.

CompositingQuality.description: Gets or sets the rendering quality of composited images drawn to this Graphics.

InterpolationMode.description: Gets or sets the interpolation mode associated with this Graphics.

SmoothingMode.description: Gets or sets the rendering quality for this Graphics.

StringFormat.description: Gets or sets text layout information (such as alignment, orientation and tab stops) display manipulations (such as ellipsis insertion and national digit substitution) and OpenType features.

TextRenderingHint.description: Gets or sets the rendering mode for text associated with this Graphics.

Alignment.description: Gets or sets horizontal alignment of the string.

FormatFlags.description: Gets or sets a System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags enumeration that contains formatting information.

HotkeyPrefix.description: Gets or sets the System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix object for this System.Drawing.StringFormat object.

LineAlignment.description: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the string.

Trimming.description: Gets or sets the System.Drawing.StringTrimming enumeration for this System.Drawing.StringFormat object.

EmfPlusDualRenderingMode.description: Gets or sets determines how EMF+ Dual metafiles should be rendered.

EmulateRasterOperations.description: Gets or sets a value determining whether or not the raster operations should be emulated.

RenderingMode.description: Gets or sets determines how metafile images should be rendered.

UseEmfEmbeddedToWmf.description: Gets or sets determines how WMF metafiles with embedded EMF metafiles should be rendered.

ScaleWmfFontsToMetafileSize.description:
Gets or sets a value determining whether or not to scale fonts in WMF metafile according to metafile size on the page.
The default value is true.

ColorMode.description:
Gets or sets a value determining how colors are rendered.
{ Normal | Grayscale}.

SaveFormat.description: Gets or sets format of save.

FileName.description: Gets or sets the name of the file.

DmlRenderingMode.description:
Gets or sets a value determining how DrawingML shapes are rendered.
{ Fallback | DrawingML }.

DmlEffectsRenderingMode.description:
Gets or sets a value determining how DrawingML effects are rendered.
{ Simplified | None | Fine }.

ZipOutput.description:
Gets or sets controls zip output or not.
Default value is false.

UpdateLastSavedTimeProperty.description: Gets or sets a value determining whether the Aspose.Words.Properties.BuiltInDocumentProperties.LastSavedTime property is updated before saving.

UpdateSdtContent.description: Gets or sets value determining whether content of  is updated before saving.

UpdateFields.description:
Gets or sets a value determining if fields should be updated before saving the document to a fixed page format.
Default value for this property is. true

CertificateFilename.description: Gets or sets certificate's filename using for signing.

Location.description: Gets or sets location of the signing.

Reason.description: Gets or sets reason for the signing.

SignatureDate.description: Gets or sets date of the signing.

DownsampleImages.description: Gets or sets specifies whether images should be downsampled.

Resolution.description: Gets or sets specifies the resolution in pixels per inch which the images should be downsampled to.

ResolutionThreshold.description:
Gets or sets specifies the threshold resolution in pixels per inch.
If resolution of an image in the document is less than threshold value,
the downsampling algorithm will not be applied.
A value of 0 means the threshold check is not used and all images that can be reduced in size are downsampled.

EncryptionAlgorithm.description: Gets or sets specifies the encryption algorithm to use.

OwnerPassword.description: Gets or sets specifies the owner password for the encrypted PDF document.

Permissions.description: Gets or sets specifies the operations that are allowed to a user on an encrypted PDF document.

UserPassword.description: Gets or sets specifies the user password required for opening the encrypted PDF document.

BookmarksOutlineLevels.description: Gets or sets allows to specify individual bookmarks outline level.

DefaultBookmarksOutlineLevel.description: Gets or sets specifies the default level in the document outline at which to display Word bookmarks.

CreateMissingOutlineLevels.description:
Gets or sets a value determining whether or not to create missing outline levels
    when the document is exported.
    Default value for this property is false.

CreateOutlinesForHeadingsInTables.description:
Gets or sets specifies whether or not to create outlines for headings (paragraphs formatted
    with the Heading styles) inside tables.

ExpandedOutlineLevels.description: Gets or sets specifies how many levels in the document outline to show expanded when the file is viewed.

HeadingsOutlineLevels.description: Gets or sets specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the document outline.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the bookmark.

BookmarksOutlineLevel.description: Gets or sets specify the bookmark's level.

SourceDocument.description: Gets or sets link to source document.
